name: Hoopa Confined
description: The Mischief Pokémon. In its true form, it possesses a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.description: If not already holding an item, this Pokémon steals the held item of any Pokémon it hits with a melee attack.

abilities.name: Form Change (Hoopa)
abilities.description: When holding the Prison Bottle, Hoopa Confined changes form to Hoopa Unbound.
